title: Broken Tristana Lore
body:
I noticed that in the (lack of) Tristana {{champion:18}}  lore, there is a weird alphanumeric character. It doesn't really impact the game much it just bothers people like me who have slight OCD.

Cheers~

replies.body:
Lol.

If you look in the game's files, and somehow stumble across the lores, you'll see that they are saved as randomized text documents that are all completely out of order and cutting off/rejoining with itself later on in other files. Characters like that alphanumeric character are what's scattered throughout the documents, so I'm thinking that the instructions to the lore in which where it exists wasn't exactly precise.

Hope you understood that; I sure didn't.
